verses.roman:
pūrva janme chilā tumi jagat-āśraya
paripūrṇa bhagavān--sarvaiśvaryamaya

synonyms: pūrva janme—in the previous birth; chilā—were; tumi—You; jagat—universe; āśraya—shelter; paripūrṇa—with full potencies; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; sarva-aiśvarya-maya—full of all opulences.
translation: "My dear sir, in Your previous birth You were the shelter of all creation, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, full of all opulences.
